message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me in the middle?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While $90 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $100. I believe this product will be a great value for you at that price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $95. Can you meet me there?
